column4: This is uncool, I compiled 2.6.20.2 and now Ubuntu doesnt recognize my wireless card, but with 2.6.17-11-generic it does, any ideas what I can do?
what wireless card do you have?
do you have the madwifi installed?
No sir, I dont even know what that is
But the thing is that under current kernel my wireless works perfect, under the newest one, it does not
i had the same problem with linux mint.. which is based on ubuntu
Were you able to solve it?
yes... but remember to install the linux-restricted-modules-2.6.??? what you have ok
i thought i had to recompile. but i did not have to...
first do the apt-cache search madwifi* line
i had to install linux-restricted-modules-2.6.17-11-386 and linux-restricted-modules-2.6.17-11-generic for the 2.6.17-11 kernel to work
Thats funny because in that Kernel my WiFi works great, but in 2.6.20.2 it does not
mine too.. but in linux mint it did not... so you have to install the 2.6.20.2 versions...
